rules_text:
Flash [i](You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)[/i]
When Wind-Blessed Guardian enters the battlefield, you may return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: [i]“Bet you thought no one was gonna be around to defend some hobo? Think again.”[/i]
notes:
CUCURCMC3

“Bet you thought no one was gonna defend some hobo? That anyone who could was miles away anyway? Well, I guess one out of two ain't bad.”
